sentences.en: He is a reclusive, timorous creature.
sentences.cn: 他是个离群索居、胆小羞怯的家伙。

sentences.en: He was the most timorous person in that event.
sentences.cn: 在那次事件中他是个胆小鬼.

sentences.en: Her expression disturbed him - sad, timorous, with a touch of defiant mischief.
sentences.cn: 她的神情忧郁, 畏怯, 又稍带着一丝儿满不在乎的调皮味,这种神情使他感到不安.

sentences.en: In the darkness the timorous wolves crept into the living - room.
sentences.cn: 那些胆怯的狼在黑暗中爬进了客厅.

sentences.en: She is as timorous as a rabbit .
She is as timorous as a rabbit.
She was no helpless, timorous female.
sentences.cn: 她决不是柔弱胆怯的女性。
那只胆小的兔子跑开了.

sentences.en: Whenever or wherever I see you next time I won't be timorous or evasive.
sentences.cn: 每当或下次无论我在何处看见你我将不会是胆怯的或逃避的.

sentences.en: Yet if wisdom should not be timorous, neither should folly be rash.
sentences.cn: 然而,如果说智者不该胆怯的话, 那么愚人也不该卤莽.
